name: Langwidere of Ev: The Trade
description:
A visual novel created for the Public Domain Jam 3.

Princess Langwidere sits in her study in the castle in Evna, capitol of the land of Ev, wearing head number 5, which loves to learn. However, her time to relax is interrupted by a girl with an unusual request for help, and involves one of her heads.

This story is based upon characters from the novel "Ozma of Oz" by L. Frank Baum.

Written by Mike Conway
Sprites by M.J. Albrecht
Backgrounds for Langwidere's sitting room by Morgan Hawke (http://ookamikasumi.deviantart.com)
Music by Eric Matyas (www.soundimage.org) and is under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0

Story, sprites, and the castle image are public domain. Morgan Hawke's backgrounds are used by permission from her DeviantArt site.

NOTE: While this is a complete game, I hope to come back and revisit it, flesh out the story, maybe add multiple endings. For now, though, I hope you enjoy it.
